entry.title: Sonor AQ2 Safari White Marine Pearl 4pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sonor
Type: Drum Set
Price: 595.00

$595 Sonor AQ2 Safari Maple Drum set! Used excellent condition with Aquarian heads. Front maple bass hoop not original. This kit punches! A compact maple kit designed for any playing situation.


The all new SONOR AQ2 Series is an extremely versatile all-maple drum system, featuring 7-ply shells, the new SmartMount isolation system, and newly designed cast lug. These drums are available in five great finishes, and are offered in some familiar configurations previously available only in lower-end shell materials. 16x15" bass drum, 10x7" tom, 13x12" floor tom, 13x6" snare drum, tom/cymbal holder and bass drum lift, you can be prepared for any playing situation. Cymbals and hardware sold separately

entry.title: Gretsch Brooklyn Blue Burst Nitron 5pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gretsch
Type: Drum Set
Price: 2795.00

$2795 Gretsch Brooklyn Blue Burst Nitron 5pc Drum Set. Used excellent condition. This set is stunning! 22x18,16x14,12x8,10x7,14x6”.

Cymbal stands, tom arm clamps and snare stand not included. 


Gretsch Brooklyn Series. Proudly hand-crafted in Gretsch’s Ridgeland, SC, USA factory, Gretsch Brooklyn produces a sound that is immediately recognizable, yet distinctively reinvented. Brooklyn drums feature 6-ply North American maple/poplar shells and are made slightly thicker than Gretsch’s USA Custom Drums and have a 30-degree bearing edge. Shell interiors are finished with classic Gretsch Silver Sealer. Each shell comes with a distinctive Brooklyn internal shell label that identifies the drum shell model number and serial number.

Brooklyn toms and snares feature the distinctive Gretsch “302” hoop. Its 3mm thick and double-flanged and is reminiscent of hoops used by Gretsch until the mid 1950’s. Brooklyn delivers classic Gretsch tones that are full, punchy and warm. Brooklyn’s innovative specifications created a new Gretsch tonal characteristic that is slightly more open and satisfyingly ambient. There is no denying that Brooklyn drums possess the sound of classic Gretsch drums, but deliver their own sonic personality.

entry.title: Zildjian 12” A Special Recording Hi Hats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zildjian
Type: Cymbals
Price: 245.00

$245 Zildjian 12” A Special Recording hi hats. Used great condition. Classic-sounding, Full-bodied Hi-hats

The tight, controlled tone of Zildjian 12" A series Special Recording hi-hats imbues your drum sound with a bright, deep quality that lends incredible finesse to everything you play. Their articulate sound drives your beat with pinpoint definition, and their clean, clear chick cuts beautifully through your mix. If you're searching for a new pair of hats, Zildjian 12" A series Special Recording hi-hats are a superb choice.

entry.title: PDP Concept Maple 7pc Pearlescent White Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: PDP
Type: Drum Set
Price: 795.00

$795 PDP Concept Maple 6pc Pearlescent White Drum set. Used excellent condition with great Remo pinstripes.  This set has no snare drum.

This kit sounds fantastic! A re-imagined line of PDP drums designed for all drummers.
The Concept Series by PDP has a fresh new look and a sound that already has drummers talking. The concept maple shells deliver famed warm depth and range and come in a myriad of today's most popular configurations. Then, add toms or bass drums to build custom-style kits to suit just about every musical style. Concept Maple drums are feature high-gloss finishes and chrome hardware.

Add to that high-end features like STM (Suspension Tom Mounts), True Pitch tension rods, MAG throw-off, die cast low-mass claw hooks, proportionate counter hoops and durable lacquer finishes, and you have a kit that unquestionably honors its DW roots.
Configuration
Bass Drum(s): 22" x 18"
Tom(s): 8" x 7", 10" x 8", 12" x 9"
Floor Tom(s): 14" x 12", 16" x 14"
Shell Material: Maple
Construction: 7-Ply
Bearing Edge: 45°

Cymbal stand not included.

entry.title: DW 9000 Drum Rack Loaded!
entry.summary:
Vendor: DW
Type: Drum hardware
Price: 575.00

 

$575 DW 9000 Main drum rack and side addition. Used excellent condition.

Absolutely killer rack! 4 booms, 2 tom arms, 4 clamps. The DWCPRKMAIN is the main rack in DW's 9000 series drum kit rack system. The DWCPRKMAIN sports heavy-gauge stainless steel tubing, matching heavy-duty clamps, and a bevy of available accessories that can easily adapt to your setup, no matter how complex. The DWCPRKMAIN is loaded with DW innovations such as soft-grip rubber feet with integrated spikes, a logo badge with a built-in level, and tube-mounted DWSM934S Cymbal Arms.

entry.title: DW Performance Candy Apple Red 14x6.5” Snare Drum
entry.summary:
Vendor: DW
Type: Snare Drums
Price: 395.00

$395 DW Performance candy apple red 14x6.5 snare drum. Used like new condition. DW Performance Series Snare Drum Features:
Matching snare drum for your DW Performance Series kit
A quality snare at an unassuming price
Handcrafted and finished in Oxnard, California
Quarter Turret lugs are sleek and recognizable
10-ply HVX maple shell is crisp, sensitive, and cutting
Heat forming/Cool Tempering maximizes shell strength, roundness, and resonance
60° bearing edges favored by John Good
Triple-flanged steel hoops deliver a fat, open attack
MAG magnetic throw off locks snares in the "on" position
Fine-threaded True-Pitch tension rods enhance tuning accuracy
DW's Tuning Sequence batter head with control dot streamlines tuning

entry.title: LP RidgeRider Cowbell and Mount
entry.summary:
Vendor: LP
Type: Drum hardware
Price: 49.00

$49 LP Ridgerider cowbell and clamp. Used. Comes as shown. Mounting your LP Rock Cowbell has never been quicker and easier. Now the mounting assembly's eyebolt is spring-loaded and self-aligning, and accommodates 3/8" and 1/2" diameter tom arms. The patent-pending mounting system is available on all Rock Models. .

These 8" mountable bells are constructed with 14-gauge steel for added strength to withstand hard pounding. Their rich, cutting sound is low pitched and moderately dry. Designed for drum kit players. Made in U.S.A.

A Jenigor plastic strip along the top edge provides dampening and prevents denting.

entry.title: DW 9000 Dual Leg Hi hat stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: DW
Type: Drum Hardware
Price: 325.00

Used excellent condition. Included DW Drop Clutch.

DW 9000 is a heavy-duty 2-leg hi-hat stand. DW's premium 9000 Series, it has all the features top drummers and techs around the world insist upon: memory locks for easy setup, plastic tube insulators for preventing rattle, secondary tilter locks, heavy gauge tubing, and more.

Drum Workshop's 9000 also offers the patented Double Eccentric Cam, for a uniquely fast and response feel that drummers love. Easing transport, you'll also find a quality uni-body folding footboard on the DW 9000. www.drumflip.com

entry.title: Roc N Soc Hydraulic Drum Throne
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roc n soc
Type: Drum hardware
Price: 225.00

$225 Roc N Soc Hydraulic drum throne with backrest. Used like new. Treat Your Seat

The Roc-n-Soc Nitro Rider drum throne is the cure for your aching you-know-what. If you're struggling with a throne that's past its expiration date, it's time to invest in your backside. Seriously, the Nitro Rider throne sports a gas shock absorber, so your back stays fatigue-free. The ergonomically cushioned seat spins, so your spine doesn't have to. And there's an easy-to-use gas lift for quick height adjustments. For comfort and durability at a great price.
Roc-n-Soc Nitro Rider Drum Throne Features at a Glance:
Standard height (18"-24")
Space saving design for compact storage
Gas shock gives bounce to the seat for reduced back fatigue
Easy-to-use gas lift for quick height adjustments
Free-spinning seat reduces spinal strain from body twisting
Ergonomic seat design helps prevent leg fatigue

entry.title: Zildjian 14” A Custom Mastersound Hi Hat Cymbals

Vendor: Zildjian
Type: Cymbals
Price: 385.00

$385 Zildjian 14” A Custom Mastersound hi hats. Used excellent condition. The A Custom Mastersound Hi-Hats feature the same crisp, rich, and colorful sounds associated with the A Custom range, with a bolder, clearer "chick" sound and full-bodied overall sound.

Developed with the assistance of Vinnie Colaiuta, A Custom cymbals are made using radical rotary hammering techniques, thin weights, and a striking, brilliant finish for crisp, sweet, sophisticated sound.

entry.title: Zildjian FX Stack 12” Cymbals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zildjian
Type: Cymbals

$115 Zildjian FX Stack 12” with mount. Used. The new Zildjian FX Stack cymbals, the latest in innovative design, provide versatility to match the range of sound you’re looking for. Set them up as traditional hi-hat cymbals, or stack them for a unique sound element in your setup.
